title: Smoked Salmon and Prawn Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['225 g tri-coloured pasta assortment', '3 tablespoons curry powder', '350g fresh prawns', '115g smoked salmon, chopped', '200g frozen green peas, thawed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
